IPDR_Key Struct Reference
[Key and type (template) attributes]

#include <IPDR.h>


Data Fields

unsigned int KeyID
unsigned int KeyTypeID
const char * KeyName
const char * KeyLabel
const char * KeyHelp
unsigned int Enabled
unsigned int AccessType
void * ExtraData
IPDR_KeyAccessor KeyAccessor

Detailed Description

The definition of a single key in a template, as passed to IPDR_CreateTemplate().

If these keys are used to automatically generate field names, it is recommended to keep the key label length to less than 20 characters to avoid truncation in the database field name.

Field Documentation

unsigned int IPDR_Key::AccessType
 

Or-ed: IPDR_ACCESS_BY_FUNCTION or IPDR_ACCESS_BY_OFFSET.

unsigned int IPDR_Key::Enabled
 

Or-ed: IPDR_KEY_DISABLED.

void* IPDR_Key::ExtraData
 

Context argument for KeyAccessor as a function.

IPDR_KeyAccessor IPDR_Key::KeyAccessor
 

either a cast offset (typically set with the C offsetof macro) or a function pointer (IPDR_KeyAccessor).

const char* IPDR_Key::KeyHelp
 

The long description for the key, for display in a UI.

unsigned int IPDR_Key::KeyID
 

The unique identifier for the key. (Unique within a template.)

const char* IPDR_Key::KeyLabel
 

The key's unique label (external name, for display in a UI). (Unique within a template.)

const char* IPDR_Key::KeyName
 

The key's unique (internal) name. (Unique within a template.)

unsigned int IPDR_Key::KeyTypeID
 

The key's type: actually IPDR_KeyType.
